Types

ByteMapping = object
  mapping*: seq[int]
  correct*: bool
Source   Edit   
ByteSection = object
  data*: ptr UncheckedArray[byte]
  length*: int
Source   Edit   
Field = object
  mapping*: ByteMapping
  inverse*: ByteMapping
  case kind*: FieldKind
  of fkBool:
    val_bool*: bool
  of fkInt8:
    val_int_8*: int8
  of fkInt16:
    val_int_16*: int16
  of fkInt32:
    val_int_32*: int32
  of fkInt64:
    val_int_64*: int64
  of fkUInt8:
    val_uint_8*: uint8
  of fkUInt16:
    val_uint_16*: uint16
  of fkUInt32:
    val_uint_32*: uint32
  of fkUInt64:
    val_uint_64*: uint64
  of fkFloat32:
    val_float_32*: float32
  of fkFloat64:
    val_float_64*: float64
  of fkChar4:
    val_char_4*: array[4, char]
  of fkByteSeq:
    val_byte_seq*: seq[byte]
  bool_from_byte*: proc (read_byte: byte): bool = :anonymous_1140851225
  bool_to_byte*: proc (write_bool: bool): byte = :anonymous_1140851231
Source   Edit   
FieldKind = enum
  fkBool, fkInt8, fkInt16, fkInt32, fkInt64, fkUInt8, fkUInt16, fkUInt32,
  fkUInt64, fkFloat32, fkFloat64, fkChar4, fkByteSeq
Source   Edit   
PositionedField = object
  field*: Field              ## false will position field from start of data length, true will position from end
  from_end*: bool ## shifts forward when `from_end` is false, shifts back when `from_end` is true
                  ## if `from_end`, length of `field` is accounted for using length of field.mapping.mapping
                  ## always in bytes
  offset*: int
Source   Edit
